definitions: the action of sailing about in an area without a precise destination, especially for pleasure

examples.text: there are many books written by people who have enjoyed cruising in yachts

shortDefinitions: action of sailing about in area without precise destination

definitions: the action or practice of wandering about a place in search of a casual sexual partner

examples.text: my gym is one of those trendy ones with a lot of cruising going on

shortDefinitions: action or practice of wandering about place in search of casual sexual partner

definitions: a young child's action of walking while holding on to furniture or other structures, prior to learning to walk without support

examples.text: it can take ages to go from cruising to proper walking

shortDefinitions: young child's action of walking while holding on to furniture prior to learning to walk without support
